entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
